# Tender Announcement

## Title
EF928-232288 - Drinking Water Sampling and Analysis Services

## Solicitation Details
* Solicitation Number: WS4207212919
* Publication Date: April 12, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: June 13, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

## Tender Overview
This request for standing offer (RFSO) invites qualified suppliers to offer their services for the provision of sampling and testing for drinking water on an order-by-order basis in the Quebec Region.

## Tender Status
The tender is currently closed.

## Tender Region and Delivery
* Region of Opportunity: Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)
* Delivery Region: Quebec (excluding National Capital Region)

## Description
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) requires a standing offer for the provision of sampling and testing services for drinking water in the Quebec Region. Services will be provided on an order-by-order basis. Detailed requirements for the service can be found in the solicitation document.

## Procurement Method
The procurement method for this tender is competitive, open to any qualified supplier who meets the eligibility criteria as outlined in the solicitation document.

## Trade Agreements
Suppliers must identify which trade agreements they believe apply to this tender. This includes, but is not limited to, NAFTA, WTO GPA, CFTA, and various free trade agreements.

## Contracting and Contact Information
The tender is being issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC). For more information and to access the solicitation document, please follow the link provided. To contact the procurement officer, please email [annabelle.cloutier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:annabelle.cloutier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
